name: RETICLE_STAR
description:
--RETICLE_STAR(レチクルスター)

Get the key and step on the goal.
If you get a star, you can use the dash.
Try to clear all 70 stage.

xinput standard controller is recommended.
The buttons in the game are based on the XBOX controller.

◆control [Gamepad operation (keyboard operation)]

Move: Left stick, Cross key (directional key)
Jump: A (Z key)
Dash: X and left stick (X key and directional key)
Restart on the spot: Y (R key)

---

(The grammar might be wrong because I translated Japanese into machine.

If the game is slow, please increase the performance on your PC to the maximum.
If the game gets stuck, please force close it immediately from Task Manager.

I've included the text of some of the Japanese instructions converted by DeepL translation (deepl_txt). It may be useful in some cases.)

---
